isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Inner Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove front cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 60 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once the front cab door trim panel (Item 1) is removed. Before removing front cab door inner door panel water shield (Item 2), note how it is positioned on the front cab door (Item 3), so that it can be installed properly during the install procedure. Carefully remove the front cab door inner door panel water shield from the front cab door, driver side shown. Lay out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 60. Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. FRONT CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
9. BLUNT TIP FLAT BLADE SCREW DRIVER

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side front cab door inner door panel water shield.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Cab Door Inner Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove rear cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

figure.caption: Figure 61. Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. REAR CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
9. BLUNT TIP FLAT BLADE SCREW DRIVER

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 61 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once the rear cab door trim panel (Item 1) is removed. Before removing rear cab door inner door panel water shield (Item 2), note how it is positioned on the rear cab door (Item 3), so that it can be installed properly during the install procedure. Carefully remove the rear cab door inner door panel water shield from the rear cab door, driver side shown. Lay out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.
Repeat procedure to remove passenger side rear cab door inner door panel water shield.
